TextEng: You will die here! My masters command it!
Text: 여기서 죽을 거야! 내 주인들의 명령이다!

TextEng: I... I bow to you. Please, spare me. My masters have failed to protect me as promised...
Text: 다... 당신에게 빌게. 제발, 살려줘. 주인님들은 약속대로 날 지켜주지 못했어...

TextEng: What?! But... you can't! I will die fighting!
Text: 뭐?! 하지만... 안 돼! 싸우다 죽을 거야!

TextEng: What... what do you want to know?
Text: 뭐... 뭘 알고 싶은데?

TextEng: Where... where are they? They said I would never fall... I surrender! I surrender!
Text: 어디... 어디 있지? 내가 절대 쓰러지지 않을 거라고 했는데... 항복할게! 항복한다고!

TextEng: I can't tell you what I don't know. I was told to report to Desther. He is our leader here. He serves the will of the Old Ones.
Text: 모르는 걸 어떻게 말해. 데스터에게 보고하라는 말만 들었어. 그가 여기 우리 지도자야. 태고의 존재들의 뜻을 섬기지.

TextEng: Thank you... I will not trouble you again. My masters... they haven't delivered what they promised.
Text: 고마워... 다시는 귀찮게 안 할게. 내 주인들이... 약속한 걸 지키지 않았어.

TextEng: I... I don't know. He's here somewhere. He is above me. I don't ask questions.
Text: 나... 나도 몰라. 어딘가에 있어. 내 위에 있는 사람이야. 난 질문 안 해.

TextEng: I swear I don't know! He's in the Hold somewhere!
Text: 정말 몰라! 맹세코! 성채 어딘가에 있다고!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I... I know, but there's nothing left that I can say except... well, I think Desther is trying to raise some more protection.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 나... 알아, 하지만 더 말할 게 없는데... 음, 데스터가 보호막을 더 올리려고 하는 것 같아.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> There's nothing left to tell that matters. I just want to leave. I was promised protection and I didn't get it.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 더 말할 게 없어. 그냥 떠나고 싶어. 보호해 준다고 약속했는데 안 지켜졌잖아.

TextEng: Well, there might be a few things. **DETAILS**
Text: 음, 몇 가지 있긴 해. **세부사항**

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Maybe there's this other thing. **DETAILS 2** That's all I know - honest!
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 혹시 다른 게 있긴 해. **세부사항 2** 그게 전부야-정말이야!

TextEng: Please! I'll tell you whatever you want! **DETAILS 2**
Text: 제발! 원하는 거 뭐든 말할게! **세부사항 2**

TextEng: The Old Ones. They are the Scale and the Eye. All will serve them and be protected... or so Desther told me...
Text: 태고의 존재들. 그들은 비늘과 눈이야. 모두가 그들을 섬기고 보호받을 거야... 데스터가 그렇게 말했어...

TextEng: I told you I don't know anymore! I just want to go! I just want to go! Please! Don't hurt me!
Text: 더 이상 모른다니까! 그냥 가고 싶어! 그냥 가고 싶단 말이야! 제발! 다치게 하지 마!

TextEng: What about it? There isn't much to tell now that we've killed everyone.
Text: 그게 왜? 우리가 모두 죽여버렸는데 별로 할 말이 없어.

TextEng: I was told they wanted a base to support people sent to Neverwinter. I wan't told why. I was just supposed to help infiltrate this place.
Text: 네버윈터로 보내진 사람들을 지원할 기지가 필요하다고 들었어. 이유는 안 들었어. 그냥 이곳에 침투하라는 명령만 받았어.

TextEng: I followed orders. Desther went to Neverwinter and we made sure nobody could get word from any real Helmites here in the Hold.
Text: 명령을 따랐을 뿐이야. 데스터가 네버윈터로 갔고, 우리는 성채의 진짜 헬름 신도들이 소식을 전하지 못하게 했어.

TextEng: I am no threat, I swear it. I won't hurt you, or anyone else.
Text: 난 위협이 아니야, 맹세해. 당신이나 다른 누구도 해치지 않을게.

TextEng: He's doing some kind of ritual to gain power, since I think he's been abandoned just like me. He probably thinks the Old Ones will be impressed...
Text: 나처럼 버림받았다고 생각하는지 힘을 얻기 위해 무슨 의식을 하고 있어. 아마 태고의 존재들이 감명받을 거라 생각하는 것 같아...

TextEng: You'll have to stop whatever spell he's begun before you fight him. He won't fall easily.
Text: 그와 싸우기 전에 그가 시작한 주문을 먼저 멈춰야 할 거야. 쉽게 쓰러지지 않을 거야.

TextEng: I don't know much else about them. I was promised protection and wealth when the end came to Neverwinter. That was enough for me to follow.
Text: 그들에 대해선 별로 아는 게 없어. 네버윈터의 종말이 왔을 때 보호와 부를 약속받았어. 그게 따르기에 충분했어.

TextEng: I don't know. I was just told that the plague served the Old Ones, and that weakening Neverwinter would prepare it for the battle to come.
Text: 몰라. 역병이 태고의 존재들을 섬기는 거고, 네버윈터를 약화시키는 게 다가올 전투를 준비하는 거라는 말만 들었어.

TextEng: I thought some of it could be lies, but they paid me and promised me more, so I did what Desther said. I'm... I'm sorry. I'm a fool.
Text: 어떤 건 거짓말일 수도 있다고 생각했지만, 돈을 주고 더 많이 약속했으니까 데스터가 시킨 대로 했어. 나... 나는 바보야.

TextEng: The cult of the Old Ones recruited me while I was traveling. I don't know where they came from or where their base is.
Text: 여행 중에 태고의 존재들의 사교에서 나를 포섭했어. 그들이 어디서 왔는지, 기지가 어딘지 몰라.

TextEng: All I know is they wanted the plague in Neverwinter to last as long as possible. It wasn't my business to ask why. They don't like questions.
Text: 내가 아는 건 그들이 네버윈터의 역병이 최대한 오래 지속되길 원했다는 것뿐이야. 왜인지는 내 일이 아니었어. 질문하는 걸 싫어하거든.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Come on, I'm just the hired help. Just let me go. I don't know anything really important. I don't.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 제발, 난 그냥 고용된 거야. 날 보내줘. 정말 중요한 건 아무것도 몰라. 정말이야.

TextEng: That's all I know! I swear it! I swear!
Text: 그게 전부야! 맹세코! 맹세해!
